snippet: Providing resources for explanation and context to help readers understand unfamiliar references in news articles, and considering how news media can make coverage more accessible to a wide range of readers, including high school and college...
abstract: Providing resources for explanation and context to help readers understand unfamiliar references in news articles, and considering how news media can make coverage more accessible to a wide range of readers, including high school and college students.

byline.original: By SARAH KAVANAGH, HOLLY EPSTEIN OJALVO and KATHERINE SCHULTEN

headline.main: Easy Access: Creating Annotated Versions of News Articles
